articles.title: Kim Jong Un Sends Thanks to Officials and Fishermen of Fishery Units on West Coast
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Sends Thanks to Officials and Fishermen of Fishery Units on West Coast
Haeju, June 3 (KCNA) -- Officials and fishermen of the fishery units on the West Coast of the country hauled more than 24 000 tons of tiny shrimp in a matter of less than two months.
					 This success was the fruition of the wise leadership of supreme commander Kim Jong Un who showed profound trust and loving care for the fishermen and led them in every aspect of their work and the devoted drive waged by them in hearty response to the call of the Party.
					
					 Kim Jong Un sent thanks to those officials and fishermen for their great success in hauling seafood.
					
					 A meeting to convey the thanks took place on Tuesday.
					
					 Present there were Vice Marshal of the Korean People's Army Hwang Pyong So, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and officers of the KPA, officials and fishermen of the fishery units on the West Coast.
					
					 After the thanks were conveyed, participants took the floor.
					
					 Then an appeal to the officials and fishermen in the fishery field across the country was adopted at the meeting.
					
					 A performance was given by the KPA Song and Dance Ensemble at the end of the meeting.

articles.title: Greetings to Egyptian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Egyptian President
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Tuesday sent a congratulatory message to Abdel Fattah al-Sisi on his election as president of the Arab Republic of Egypt.
					 The message expressed belief that the traditional friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Egypt will grow stronger in the future, too, sincerely wishing the president great success in his responsible work for achieving the stability of the country and its economic development.

articles.title: DPRK FM Meets Heir to Emir and Other High Dignitaries of Kuwait
articles.content:
DPRK FM Meets Heir to Emir and Other High Dignitaries of Kuwait
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- DPRK Foreign Minister Ri Su Yong, head of the DPRK government delegation, Monday separately met and  had talks with Nawaf Al Ahmad Al Jaber Al Sabah, heir to the emir of Kuwait, the speaker of the National Assembly and the minister of State for Cabinet Affairs.
					 Present there were members of the delegation, the DPRK ambassador to Kuwait, the head of the office of the heir to the emir, the head of the Seretaries Office of the National Assembly and officials concerned.
					
					 The heir to the emir expressed the  firm stand of the government of Kuwait to boost the cooperative relations between the two countries in different fields including politics, economy and culture.
					
					 He hoped that the north and the south of Korea would achieve peaceful reunification free from foreign interference.
					
					 He stressed the need to boost mutual support and cooperation in the interantional arena.
					
					 The speaker of the National Assembly said that the DPRK foreign minister's visit to Kuwait was a clear proof that the friendly relations between the two countries were invariably developling under the care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed his expectation that the visit would be a significant occasion in developing the bilateral relations.

articles.title: Data on Human Rights Abuses of U.S. and S. Korea Distributed as Official Document of UNGA and UNSC
articles.content:
Data on Human Rights Abuses of U.S. and S. Korea Distributed as Official Document of UNGA and UNSC
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A memorandum, white paper and article on human rights abuses by the U.S. and south Korea were distributed as official document A/68/869-S/2014/321 of the UN General Assembly and the UN Security Council on June 2.
					 The memorandum titled "We lay bare and condemn unprecedented crimes committed by the U.S. against the Korean nation" was released by the Central Committee of the Democratic Front for the Reunification of Korea and the North Headquarters of the Nationwide Special Committee for Probing the Truth behind GIs' Massacres.
					
					 The white paper titled "We disclose the world's poorest human rights record in south Korea" was issued by the National Reunification Institute and the Measure Council for Human Rights in South Korea.
					
					 The article was released by KCNA under the title "Bitter confession and Poorest Human Rights Record in U.S."

articles.title: Just Cause of Korean People Favored by WFDY
articles.content:
Just Cause of Korean People Favored by WFDY
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The meeting of the General Council of the World Federation of Democratic Youth (WFDY) expressed full support and solidarity with the Korean people's just cause on May 29.
					 A political report of the meeting said tensions persist on the Korean peninsula due to the U.S. interference and provocative moves and urged the U.S. to stop at once threat and blockade against the DPRK.
					
					 A statement on peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula was adopted at the meeting. It said the peninsula is becoming the biggest hot spot in the world owing to the hostile policy towards the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and south Korean bellicose forces.
					
					 It demanded the U.S. withdraw its hostile policy towards the DPRK immediately and unconditionally halt reckless moves for a nuclear war and conspiratorial moves targeting the DPRK in order to establish a lasting peace-keeping mechanism on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities stop at once heinous anti-DPRK confrontational moves, root cause of distrust and disaster of war, mend the inter-Korean relations in the idea of By the Korean National Itself and accept the sincere and rational proposals of the DPRK to reunify the country.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the Korean people and youth in their just struggle to independently and peacefully reunify the country and build a thriving socialist nation without fail.
					
					 The World Federation of Democratic Youth is firmly convinced once again that the world progressive people and youth and students loving peace against war would condemn the hostile policy towards the DPRK pursued by the U.S. and its followers and actively join the Korean people and youth in their struggle for defending independence and justice.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Jidda Baba Ahmed, secretary of the Borno State Government of Nigeria, and his party visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Wednesday.
					 They laid a bouquet before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Anniversary of Victorious Pochonbo Battle Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Victorious Pochonbo Battle Marked
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Today marks the 77th anniversary of victory in the battle of Pochonbo, which was commanded by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 After occupying Korea, the Japanese imperialists had worked hard to deprive the Korean nation of its spirit and language in a bid to intensify its colonial rule.
					
					 Kim Il Sung led the main force of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) to advance into the northern border area of Korea in early June Juche 26 (1937) and attacked Pochonbo in the evening of June 4.
					
					 The battle gave the Japanese invaders the cold creeps. And it convinced the Korean people, who had thought Korea was dead, that their country was still alive.
					
					 In the wake of the battle of Pochonbo, Kim Il Sung victoriously led the battle on Mt. Kouyushui and the battle of Jiansanfeng, thus demonstrating the invincible might of the KPRA.
					
					 The news of the victorious battle of Pochonbo was headlined by local and foreign newspapers.
					
					 Pravda and Krasnoye Znamya of the Soviet Union and other newspapers and radios of China, Japan, France and other countries gave much space to the battle, under such titles as "Guerrilla Warfare in the Northern Area of Korea", "Defeat in Pochonbo", etc.

articles.title: Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Starts
articles.content:
Study Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Starts
Hyesan, June 4 (KCNA) -- School youth and children across the country set out on the study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu on the occasion of the 75th anniversary of victory in the battle in the Musan area commanded by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					 They had a kick-off meeting in front of the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo in Hyesan City, Ryanggang Province on Wednesday.
					
					 They laid a floral basket and flowers before the statue of Kim Il Sung of the monument.
					
					 A report was followed by speeches.
					
					 The reporter and speakers said the study tour would offer a good occasion for all school youth and children to keep the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu created by the President and glorified by leader Kim Jong Il as the soul and lifeline of the Korean revolution and carry forward and accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 After the meeting members of the study tour group started the march towards Pochonbo.
					
					 They arrived at the area where the battle of Pochonbo was fought under the command of the President.
					
					 They presented a floral basket and bouquets before his statue standing on the side of Karim stream.
					
					 They looked round the command post of the battle, the then police substation of the Japanese imperialists, the sub-county administrative office,  the post office and so on.
					
					 They held a bonfire gathering on the side of Karim stream that evening.

articles.title: Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
articles.content:
Sports Contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize Opens
Hyesan, June 4 (KCNA) -- A sports contest for Pochonbo Torch Prize opened in the DPRK on the occasion of the anniversary of the victory in the battle of Pochonbo commanded by President Kim Il Sung during the anti-Japanese armed struggle. It will be held in Pyongyang, Phyongsong, Hamhung, Nampho and other places.
					 Its participants will compete in at least 30 events including football, volleyball, basketball, table tennis and marathon race.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Hyesan Stadium in Ryanggang Province on Wednesday.
					
					 Present there were officials concerned and sports persons and working people, youth and students in Hyesan City.
					
					 Kim Pyong Sik, vice-minister of Physical Culture and Sports, made an opening address.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony a football match was held.

articles.title: Foodstuffs Made with Jonghyang Compound Lactobacilli Popular in DPRK
articles.content:
Foodstuffs Made with Jonghyang Compound Lactobacilli Popular in DPRK
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Various kinds of foodstuffs, including nutritive powder and drinks, made with Jonghyang compound lactobacilli have gained popularity among the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 The compound lactobacilli helps keep resistance to disease, promote growth, make immune activators, improve digestion in human body and soften skin.
					
					 It is particularly efficacious for antibiosis and detoxication.
					
					 Foodstuffs made with the lactobacilli help prevent diabetes, cerebral and cardiovascular diseases and fatness and recover physical fatigue.
					
					 They are also believed to be good for cacostomia and children's growth. 
					
					 Their maker is the Cheryokjungjin Company.

articles.title: History of Roadside Tree-Planting in Korea
articles.content:
History of Roadside Tree-Planting in Korea
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Korean nation has a long history of roadside tree- planting.
					 The roadside tree-planting in Korea has been observed from the 15th century back, said Dr. Han Myong Gil, a teacher of Kim Il Sung University in the DPRK, adding:
					
					 Historical data show that an ordinance was issued in 1405, the early period of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910), to plant trees along the roads in the city of Seoul.
					
					 According to historical records, the country's main roads in 1441 were distinguished by landmarks or trees and an ordinance was issued in 1453 to plant pine, pear, chestnut, willow and other suitable trees on both sides of roads on the outskirts of Seoul from next spring.
					
					 Meanwhile, various kinds of trees, including gingko, had been planted around government offices, Buddhist temples and other buildings and residential quarters as well as on roadsides there.  Some of the then trees remain alive still now.
					
					 This tradition of the Korean nation is steadily carried forward under the policy of the DPRK government that calls for turning the whole country into a thick woodland and greenery.

articles.title: 57th Chinese Tourist Group Visits DPRK
articles.content:
57th Chinese Tourist Group Visits DPRK
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A group of 226 Chinese tourists visited the Democratic People's Republic of Korea from June 2-4.
					 It is the 57th round of tourism held under an agreement made between the Korean International Juvenile Travel Company and Dandong Branch Company of the China's Guolu International Travel Agency.
					
					 During its tour, the group visited Panmunjom and saw the historical relics on display at the Koryo Museum in Kaesong City. It also toured edifices in the capital city of Pyongyang, including the Tower of the Juche Idea and the Arch of Triumph, and enjoyed an art performance given by schoolchildren at the Mangyongdae Schoolchildren's Palace.
					
					 Taking traditional Korean dishes was one of the tourists' main attractions.
					
					 Jia Yubu, general manager of the Kanghui International Travel Agency in Dandong of China, told KCNA that the agency would organize more tourist groups to make them get a better understanding of the DPRK.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Wrong Personnel Policy
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Wrong Personnel Policy
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Park Geun Hye of south Korea appointed Kim Kwan Jin, puppet minister of Defense, as successor to the chief of the security office of Chongwadae on June 1.
					 This clearly brought to light the hypocrisy of the "promise" Park made to the south Korean people to punish those responsible for the ferry Sewol disaster in her "talk to the people" on May 19.
					
					 As far as Kim is concerned, he is a special-class criminal who deserves judgment by the people after being held wholly accountable for the ferry Sewol disaster.
					
					 Although he has under his control huge forces including diving equipment for saving lives, to say nothing of equipment for rescue operations, he failed to start the rescue operations but worked hard to evade the responsibility. In a bid to help the Park group get rid of the pretty fix, he accused the DPRK in an effort to divert elsewhere the public criticism of the group.
					
					 Not content with floating fictions about the "April nuclear test by the north" and "drones from it", he wooed military gangsters into cooking up a story about "north's shelling" in the most sensitive hot spot of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 While turning a deaf ear to the voices of bereaved families calling for finding dead bodies of those missing and the angry public mindset in south Korea, the Kim-led military gangsters undisguisedly revealed their wild ambition for confrontation with compatriots in the north, as evidenced by their opening of the "5-phase military strategy toward the north".
					
					 Kim should be punished by the public as he has gone busy kicking up anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria in a bid to help Park get rid of the worst ruling crisis caused by her sycophancy towards the U.S. and unpopular rule, far from working hard to rescue those missing. 
					
					 This notwithstanding, Park is about to appoint such a hooligan to  the post of the chief of the security office of Chongwadae even before the tears shed by bereaved families are dry after throwing away the "promise" she made to the people like a pair of old shoes.  This is another farce staged against the south Korean people calling for probing the truth behind the ferry Sewol disaster and taking measures for it.
					
					 Park's intention to appoint Kim to the important post of "unification", diplomacy and security is a blatant challenge to the compatriots desirous of peace and security on the Korean peninsula and the public mindset at home and abroad.
					
					 As already known to the world, Kim is no more than a diehard pro-U.S. lackey and the worst traitor who brought the greatest danger of a war to the peninsula as a war servant and special-class stooge of the U.S.
					
					 After adopting with the U.S. bellicose forces the "tailored deterrent strategy" aimed to mount a preemptive nuclear strike at the DPRK, he further intensified military provocations against the DPRK than ever before after allowing the U.S. introduce nuclear carriers into the East, South and West Seas of Korea.
					
					 Moreover, he let U.S. nuclear-capable B-52s fly into the sky above the Korean peninsula and conduct bombing drills.
					
					 Kim is, at the same time, a wicked confrontation maniac who pushed the north-south relations to a catastrophe.
					
					 It was none other than Kim who incited the "outlook on security" and "outlook on the principal enemy" within the puppet south Korean army and inspected its frontline posts to cry out for "countering first and making a report next." He was the arch criminal who hurled gangsters of the puppet army into perpetrating such a thrice-cursed crime as firing at the targets hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system after setting them up in their drill grounds.
					
					 Entering this year, he ordered commanding and staff officers of units at various levels to make preparations for high-handed counter-actions against the "north's provocations," terming the proposal made by the DPRK for the improvement of the north-south relations as "double-dealing tactics" and "camouflaged peace offensive."
					
					 No sooner had an agreement on terminating the smear campaign been adopted between the north and the south than he desperately pursued the anti-DPRK campaign, blustering "psychological warfare against the north is not a smear campaign."
					
					 In the final analysis, what Kim has done is nothing but dangerous criminal acts aimed to bedevil the inter-Korean relations and ignite a war against the north.
					
					 The reality clearly shows that the north-south relations can never improve in line with the expectation of the nation and the situation on the peninsula will become more strained as long as diehard confrontation maniacs like Kim are allowed to go scot-free. 
					
					 Park Geun Hye will be held wholly responsible for all the consequences to be entailed by her appointment of the wicked guy as chief of the security office of Chongwadae.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Debunks U.S. Nonsensical Talk about Russia-China Ties
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Debunks U.S. Nonsensical Talk about Russia-China Ties
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- These days the U.S. is talking rubbish about the Russia-China relations getting ever closer in a bid to play down their meaning, asserting "it is nothing surprising" and "it is not an unexpected response." 
					 Some high-ranking officials are vying with each other to comment on the development of the Russia-China relations and diplomatic experts predict that the upcoming geopolitical structure will divide into the two sides: Russia and China aspiring after common cause and the U.S. seeking "liberty". The above-said remarks made by the U.S. reflect its uneasiness. 
					
					 Recently China and Russia adopted a joint statement on boosting cooperation in the political, military, economic, cultural and other fields. 
					
					 Joint military activities, financial transaction by use of their national currency and trade between the two countries are gaining in scope and strength. 
					
					 Russia fully supported China's proposal for establishing a cooperation body for security of Asia. 
					
					 The two countries are taking joint counter-actions against the U.S. moves to fish in troubled waters by taking advantage of regional disputes. They jointly exercised veto at the UN Security Council over the issue of Syria, dealing blows at the U.S. moves against Syria. 
					
					 The close relations between the two countries are a positive result of the development of the bilateral relations prompted by the trend of the times and political interests of the countries. 
					
					 This cannot but be a heavy blow at the U.S. foreign policy for world domination.
					
					 The U.S. is now tight-cornered as it is driven into the quagmire of wars of aggression it launched in different parts of the world. 
					
					 It is saddled with foreign debts running into astronomical figures due to excessive arms race and staggering because of a serious economic crisis and financial shortage. 
					
					 The U.S. pivot to Asia-Pacific strategy aimed to tide over the domestic and external crisis is sparking off antipathy of the regional people for its hegemonic purpose. 
					
					 Under this situation, the U.S. cannot but be upset by the development of the close ties between the two powers in the region. 
					
					 What the U.S. is talking is nothing but bluffing to hide its uneasiness.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for Global Independence
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for Global Independence
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- It is the task common to the world people at present to achieve global independence, says Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article.
					 To make the whole world independent means doing away with all forms of domination, subjugation, aggression and war worldwide and letting all countries and nations legitimately exercise their sovereignty as masters of their destiny.
					
					 Global independence is the urgent target of struggle for achieving the human cause of independence, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 An independent world means the one completely freed from imperialism and hegemony.
					
					 A dangerous international situation whereby the sovereignty of countries and nations is violated will always prevail and democratic international community would be unthinkable unless a definite end is put to imperialism and hegemony.
					
					 The independent world is the one where the full sovereignty of all countries and nations has been achieved.
					
					 There may be countries, big or small, developed or underdeveloped, but there can never be superior or inferior countries and the nation which dominates other nations or to be subject to its domination.
					
					 The DPRK has made a dynamic struggle to achieve global independence under the guidance of the great party.
					
					 It will as ever make vigorous endeavors till the whole world becomes independent free from imperialism and hegemony.
					
					 The people of the independent and progressive countries will wage a dynamic struggle for global independence.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Calls for More Dynamic Drive for Creating Korean Speed
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Calls for More Dynamic Drive for Creating Korean Speed
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday carries an article to mark the first anniversary of the publication of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's appeal "Let Us Usher in a Fresh Heyday on All the Fronts of Socialist Construction by Creating the 'Speed on Masik Pass'".
					 The appeal, published on June 4, Juche 102 (2013), serves as an engine for making the spirit of bringing about leap forward and innovations prevail over the country, racing against time amid the hot wind of Kim Jong Il's patriotism.
					
					 His appeal serves as a militant banner for powerfully encouraging all service personnel and people in the drive to create the speed for uninterrupted great innovations and leap forward, the article says, adding:
					
					 The soldier-builders of the Masikryong Ski Resort successfully completed the huge projects in a brief span of time which would take others ten years at an ordinary pace by pushing forward nearly 60 projects at a lightning speed, bearing deep in mind the historic appeal written by  Kim Jong Un, foreseeing the happy people. 
					
					 The service personnel and people are now vigorously dashing ahead, surpassing the past norms and records with the same vim and vigor with which they created  "speed on Masik Pass", a new one-match-for-a-hundred speed for offensive.
					
					 Soldier-builders and members of shock-brigades active in the construction of stockbreeding base in the Sepho plateau are now creating the second "speed on Masik Pass" and the speed of Sepho plateau in its reclamation, creation of pasture and construction of stock-breeding base by harnessing nature with the same strong resolution, indomitable will and persevering pluck as displayed by soldier-builders of the Ski Resort on Masik Pass.
					
					 The factories in the field of light industry which play an important role in improving the people's living standard are achieving signal successes in the production of a variety of foodstuff and essential daily necessities by operating machines in full capacity.
					
					 The article calls upon all service personnel and people to more dynamically accelerate the building of a thriving nation under the uplifted banner of the Korean speed.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Regime's Anti-DPRK Human Rights Campaign
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime is busy conducting false propaganda for groundlessly distorting the reality of the DPRK under the pretext of "human rights". It decided to formally set up the "UN office for human rights in the north" in south Korea.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article terms this a cynical ploy of the puppet regime to divert elsewhere the public attention in a bid to tide over its worsening ruling crisis caused by the ferry Sewol disaster and conceal its conversion of south Korea into the worst tundra of human rights in the world.
					
					 This is, at the same time, an unpardonable hostile act and a politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK as it is aimed to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and thus escalate the confrontation with the compatriots in the north and realize the wild ambition for the unification of the social systems, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 The life and security of people in south Korea are now exposed to constant threat due to all sorts of crimes getting evermore rampant there.
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group is getting evermore undisguised in its conspiratorial racket for malignantly hurting the most advantageous socialist system in the DPRK centered on its popular masses. This cannot but be a brazen-faced behavior.
					
					 It will only push the north-south relations to a more uncontrollable catastrophe and increase the danger of a war on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Park group is running the whole gamut of gimmicks to deceive the public and attain its sinister politically-motivated purpose.
					
					 However, it can never hide its despicable true colors as the most horrible anti-human rights regime and a vicious confrontation one which has its roots in the ill-famed "yusin" dictatorship.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Opt for Apology and Reparation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Urges Japan to Opt for Apology and Reparation
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A group was set up and launched its work in Japan recently to look into the background against which former Chief Cabinet Secretary Kono worked out a statement admitting the forcible drafting of sexual slaves for the Imperial Japanese Army.
					 Japan had loudly trumpeted about inheriting the Kono statement in the past. But now it is denying measures taken by the preceding governments and persistently distorting the crime-woven history in a bid to realize its ambition for reinvasion.
					
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday terms this a revelation of a sinister attempt of the Japanese reactionaries to deny truth and justice of history, distort crime-woven past, facilitate Japan's militarization and veer to the Right and thus realize its ambition for reinvasion at any cost.
					
					 The crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists are hideous crimes against humanity that shocked the world, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 History records lots of aggressions and wars, big or small. But there are no beasts like the Japs who took to battlefields 200 000 Korean women to meet their animal desire and boost the aggressive fever of the army.
					
					 The ultra-right reactionaries of Japan have behaved mischievously in recent years, denying the existence of the sexual slavery and saying they would reexamine the Kono statement.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries' denial of the past crimes and distortion of history are a prelude to reinvasion.
					
					 No matter how desperately Japan may try to deny its past crimes and distort history, Japan's past crimes can never be written off from history and the minds of the world people.
					
					 Japan should not behave mischievously but opt for making an apology and reparation for its past crimes. This is the way for the present Japanese government to shake off the ill fame of an enemy state.

articles.title: Application of Tuition-Free Program to Korean Schools Demanded
articles.content:
Application of Tuition-Free Program to Korean Schools Demanded
Tokyo, June 3 (KNS-KCNA) -- A rally was held in Itabashi Ward, Tokyo Metropolis on May 31 in protest against the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools.
					 Present there were members of the executive committee of the rally and the liaison council opposing the exclusion of Korean schools from the tuition-free program for senior high schools, Koreans in Japan and Japanese citizens.
					
					 Speeches were made by the secretary general of the above-said liaison council, the representative of the executive committee and other Japanese personages.
					
					 Speakers said that it is a manifestation of national discrimination by the state to exclude Korean schools from the tuition-free program.
					
					 They expressed the will to make the tuition-free program applied to Korean schools through more brisk activities of Japanese citizens.
					
					 Then followed speeches by the principal of Tokyo Korean Middle and High School, principal of Tokyo Korean Primary School No. 3, parents of students and Koreans in Japan.
					
					 They said that only Korean schools were excluded from the tuition-free program due to the unreasonable discrimination policy of the Japanese government, calling for pooling efforts in the actions to settle the issue of supporting Korean schools.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants launched a demo.

articles.title: All-People Candlelight Rally Held in Seoul
articles.content:
All-People Candlelight Rally Held in Seoul
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- An all-people candlelight rally took place at Chonggye Plaza in Seoul on May 31 in protest against the Park Geun Hye group's mass killings of people, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News. It was sponsored by the All-People Measure Council of Ferry Sewol Disaster comprising more than 800 civic and public organizations.
					 Attending it were more than 10 000 people from all walks life.
					
					 At the rally speakers denounced the "government" and the "Saenuri Party" for failing to make a thorough probe into the truth about the disaster, indifferent to the candlelight actions of people of all social standings.
					
					 A woman who lost her daughter due to the disaster declared she would not halt the 10 million-people signature campaign demanding a thorough probe into the truth about the disaster and punishment of those responsible.
					
					 Pak Ju Min, secretary general of the Bar Association for Democratic Society, said accidents are occurring one after another at a time when people are grieved over the ferry Sewol disaster, adding that those responsible for the disaster should be sternly punished.
					
					 Rev. Jo Hon Jong accused the "government" of trying to get rid of the crisis caused by the disaster.
					
					 Yun Hui Suk, representative of the Youth Solidarity, said the number of the participants in the signature campaign reached over 780 000, noting that not only families receiving signatures but citizens signing are conducting the campaign in tears.
					
					 At the end of the rally the participants staged demos in streets of Seoul.
					
					 A large-scale anti-"government" candlelight rally was also held in Kyonggi Province.

articles.title: S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities' Suppression of People
articles.content:
S. Korean Organization Denounces Authorities' Suppression of People
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- The Citizens Solidarity for Democratic Society of south Korea released a commentary on June 2 condemning the authorities for intensifying the suppression of people to evade responsibility for the ferry Sewol tragedy.
					 The commentary accused the "government" of making haste to gag the people and media right after the occurrence of the disaster.
					
					 It continued:
					
					 Police, the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee, ministries and agencies pressurized the people to stay put as the captain of the ferry did, threatening to strongly deal with the groundless rumors.
					
					 To cite an example, police hurled more than 1 000 investigation agents into a wholesale whirlwind of investigation, claiming they censored stories about the ferry posted on internet to cope with acts of "spoiling the atmosphere of mourning" from the beginning of the disaster. 
					
					 The Ministry of Education sent urgent official documents to the city and provincial education agencies, threatening to punish the students posting articles on the ferry sinking accident and the Broadcasting and Communication Examination Committee also demanded the deletion of a video conveying foreign news.
					
					 The facts that the regime directly controlled the media are being disclosed one after another. The suppression of the freedom of expression caused a delay in coping with the accident.
					
					 If the regime prevents the people from raising problems, it will cause the second disaster.

articles.title: Korean Women in U.S. Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime
articles.content:
Korean Women in U.S. Demand Resignation of Park Geun Hye Regime
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Korean women in the U.S. held a candlelight rally in Los Angeles on May 31 in demand of the resignation of the south Korean puppet regime, according to Minjok Thongsin, the internet newspaper of Koreans in the U.S.
					 Speakers at the rally said that there are many missing persons though more than forty days have passed since the ferry Sewol sinking accident occurred.
					
					 They stressed that the probe into the truth behind the disaster, investigation into the state policy and institution of a special law are the unanimous demand of the bereaved families.
					
					 Prior to the rally, the participants held a meeting for honoring the memory of the victims before the puppet consulate general and staged a demo.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Karelia of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Karelia of Russia
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A Karelia, Russia, committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed on May 28.
					 Viktor Yegorov, chairman of the Karelia-DPRK Friendship Association of Russia, was elected as chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President from May 28 to July 10.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ulyanovsk of Russia
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Ulyanovsk of Russia
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering President Kim Il Sung was formed in Ulyanovsk, Russia on May 29.
					 Aleksandr Kruglikov, chairman of the "Jongilbong" Russia-Korea Friendship Association of Ulyanovsk Region, was elected as chairman of the remembrance committee.
					
					 The committee decided to organize colorful political and cultural events praising the revolutionary career and feats of the President from May 29 to July 10.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Peruvian Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Peruvian Organization
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Articles titled "Kim Jong Il, immortal exploits in party building" and "By developing Workers' Party of Korea into mother party" were posted by the Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship on its website on May 26 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of his work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The articles said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader and eternal general secretary of the WPK who developed it into an invincible party, a mother party which serves the people and the guiding force for carrying out the socialist cause by wisely leading it for nearly half a century.
					
					 They paid the highest tribute to him who set a shining example in party building and activities and performed immortal exploits.
					
					 The WPK will as ever develop into the great party of President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the articles said.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Personages of Bangladesh, Myanmar
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Personages of Bangladesh, Myanmar
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- Figures of Bangladesh and Myanmar released statements on May 25 and 28 on the occasion of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Garib Newaz, president of the Bangladesh People's League, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il made a great contribution to the cause of party building while leading the WPK for nearly half a century after he started work at the WPK Central Committee.
					
					 He saw to it that the WPK developed with the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung as the only guidelines.
					
					 As the WPK was led by him, it could become a strong party with the steadfast independent stand, unfazed by all storms and trials of history.
					
					 Tin Tun, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il wisely led the party, army and people of the DPRK with his outstanding idea, energetic leadership and noble traits for decades, performing immortal exploits on behalf of the era and history.
					
					 His extraordinary exploit is that he successfully settled the issue of succession to the leadership with noble sense of duty for the destiny of the country and people and the future of revolution.
					
					 That's why the Korean people are holding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Peruvian Political Party
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Peruvian Political Party
Pyongyang, June 4 (KCNA) -- June 19 is the day to be specially recorded in the human history that makes the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the Korean people, progressive parties and people all over the world recollect with deep emotion the exploits of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union said this in a statement on May 28.
					
					 Kim Jong Il developed in depth the immortal Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung and built the WPK into an ever-victorious party which firmly holds high the banner of socialism, setting an example for building a revolutionary party, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 He made sure that the WPK led the revolution and construction to victory, frustrating the anti-socialist, anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and their stooges under the unfurled banner of Songun for nearly half a century since he started work at the Central Committee of the WPK on June 19, 1964.
					
					 It is quite natural that the exploits he performed in party building and his Songun leadership are recognized and praised by the world.
					
					 We extend invariable support and solidarity to the WPK and the Korean people who are holding him in high esteem as the eternal general secretary of the WPK and struggling for the victory of the socialist cause, the cause of independence against imperialism under the outstanding leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en reunion de Consejo General de FMJD
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe carta de participantes en reunion de Consejo General de FMJD
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio una carta que le dirigieran el 29 de mayo los participantes en la reunion del Consejo General de la Federacion Mundial de la Juventud Democratica, efectuada en Hanoi de Vietnam.
					La misiva senala que todos los participantes en el conclave condenaron la politica hostil y las imprudentes maniobras provocativas militares de los EE.UU. y sus aliados contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y expresaron el entero apoyo y solidaridad a la lucha del pueblo y la juventud de la RPDC por defender la soberania del pais y la dignidad de la nacion y lograr la paz y la estabilidad de la region.
					
					Gracias a la politica de amor del Mariscal Kim Jong Un por el pueblo y de dar importancia a la nacion coreana, en la RPDC se crean el milagro e innovacion asombrosos en la construccion de un Estado Prospero y se realizan el sueno y el ideal del pueblo, subraya la carta y va como sigue:
					
					Esta realidad de la RPDC infunde coraje y animo a los pueblos y jovenes progresistas del mundo que luchan por la construccion de un nuevo mundo independiente y pacifico, y castiga severamente a los imperialistas.
					
					La situacion de la Peninsula Coreana esta al borde de guerra nuclear debido a las maniobras de sanciones y bloqueo y las abiertas amenazas militares de EE.UU. y sus fuerzas satelites y llega al climax la campana intrigante anti-RPDC.
					
					Pero nada puede impedir el avance del pueblo coreano que convencido de la victoria final, marcha con vigor con el poderio de la unidad monolitica por el camino socialista optado por si mismo.
					
					En adelante tambien, los participantes en la reunion revelaran y condenaran la insistente politica hostil anti-RPDC y las maniobras de amenaza militar de las fuerzas belicistas de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea y desplegaran con mas audacia las actividades de solidaridad con la justa lucha del pueblo y la juventud de la RPDC.

articles.title: FMJD apoya justa causa del pueblo coreano
articles.content:
FMJD apoya justa causa del pueblo coreano
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- La reunion del Consejo General de la Federacion Mundial de la Juventud Democratica (FMJD) manifesto el 29 de mayo el irrestricto apoyo y solidaridad a la justa causa del pueblo coreano. 
					El informe politico del foro revelo que en la Peninsula Coreana perdura la situacion tensa y se crea el peligro de guerra debido a las intervenciones y provocaciones de EE.UU., y urgio fuertemente al imperio parar de inmediato la amenaza y el bloqueo contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					
					La declaracion sobre la paz y la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana, aprobada en la reunion, senala que debido a la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicistas surcoreanas, la Peninsula Coreana se convierte en la zona mas candente del mundo. 
					
					El documento demanda a EE.UU. cancelar inmediatamente la politica hostil a la RPDC y parar incondicionalmente la imprudente y agresiva campana de guerra nuclear y complots anti-RPDC para establecer el sistema de paz duradera en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Exige fuertemente a las autoridades surcoreanas poner de inmediato fin a las maniobras conflictivas anti-RPDC que causan la desconfianza y los desastres de guerra y aceptar los proyectos sinceros y racionales de la RPDC por mejorar las relaciones intercoreanas y lograr la reunificacion de la patria bajo el ideal de "Entre nosotros, los connacionales". 
					
					Manifiesta el apoyo y solidaridad con la justa lucha del pueblo y los jovenes coreanos por reunificar la patria de manera independiente y pacifica y construir sin falta un Estado prospero socialista. 
					
					La FMJD expresa una vez mas la firme conviccion de que los pueblos y los jovenes y estudiantes progresistas del mundo, que se oponen a la guerra y aman la paz, denunciaran la politica hostil anti-RPDC de EE.UU. y sus satelites y se sumaran a la lucha del pueblo y los jovenes coreanos por defender la independencia y la justicia.

articles.title: ACNC comenta la farsa de "destitucion" de responsables de la tragedia de Sewol
articles.content:
ACNC comenta la farsa de "destitucion" de responsables de la tragedia de Sewol
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- La mandataria surcoreana Park Geun-hye nomino el dia primero al ministro de Defensa Nacional Kim Kwan Jin como sustituto del jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae. 
					De esta manera, se ha revelado el caracter enganoso de la "promesa" de Park de castigar a los responsables de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol", hecha el 19 de mayo al publicar su "declaracion al pueblo". 
					
					Kim Kwan Jin es el criminal de primera clase que debe ser sentenciado por la poblacion surcoreana por el caso de hundimiento del barco de pasajeros "Sewol". 
					
					Si bien controla los equipos de auxilio, los aparatos de buceo para el rescate y otras enormes fuerzas armadas, el no procedio a la operacion de rescate tratando de eludir la responsabilidad. Para salvar a la banda de Park en crisis, acuso groseramente a la RPDC tratando de distraer el enfoque de lucha antigubernamental. 
					
					Difundio el rumor infundado de "prueba nuclear en abril" y de "drones norcoreanos" e invento el caso de "canonazo" de la RPDC en la zona mas candente del Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					
					Desoyendo las voces de los familiares de victimas y de la poblacion surcoreana en demanda de la busqueda de los cadaveres de los desaparecidos en la tragedia de Sewol, demostro abiertamente la ambicion de confrontacion fratricida publicando la "estrategia militar de 5 etapas contra el Norte de Corea". 
					
					Sin embargo, Park Geun-hye quiere nombrar ese canalla como jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae. Esto es otro engano a la poblacion surcoreana que demanda el esclarecimiento de la tragedia del ferry "Sewol" y un desafio a la opinion publica interna y externa y a la nacion coreana aspirante a la paz y estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Como ya es conocido por todo el mundo, Kim Kwan Jin es el vendepatria proyanqui y traidor a la nacion que trajo la peor crisis de guerra a la Peninsula Coreana actuando como sirviente mas fiel a EE.UU. 
					
					Aprobo con los belicistas del circulo militar norteamericano la "estrategia del disuasivo de forma de ajuste" para asestar el golpe nuclear preventivo a la RPDC e intensifico mas que nunca las provocaciones militares introduciendo el portaaviones nuclear norteamericano en los mares Este, Oeste y Sur de Corea. 
					
					Y permitio al bombardero estrategico norteamericano B-52 cargado de armas nucleares librar los ejercicios de lanzamiento de bombas nucleares en el espacio aereo de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Ademas, Kim es el maniaco de enfrentamiento que llevo a la ruptura las relaciones intercoreanas. 
					
					Ese traidor infundio en el ejercito titere la "concepcion de seguridad y de enemigo principal" e instruyo "reaccionar primero y avisarlo despues" en su inspeccion por los puestos militares avanzados. E hizo en los campos de entrenamiento del ejercito titere disparar balas contra los objetos que simbolizan la maxima dignidad y el regimen de la RPDC. 
					
					Este ano tambien, ordeno a los comandantes y miembros del Estado Mayor de las unidades militares a todos los niveles tomar las contramedidas intransigentes a la supuesta "provocacion del Norte de Corea" insultando la propuesta norcoreana por la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas como "tactica de dos caras" y "ofensiva de paz disfrazada". 
					
					Tan pronto como se aprobara el acuerdo Norte-Sur sobre el cese de calumnias a la contraparte, dijo que "la campana psicologica anti-RPDC no se incluye a la categoria de calumnias". 
					
					Como vemos, lo que hizo Kim Kwan Jin es haber roto los vinculos Norte-Sur y cometido crimenes para desatar la guerra de agresion anti-RPDC. 
					
					Mientras existen en suelo surcoreano los maniacos de enfrentamiento como Kim Kwan Jin, no se mejoraran las relaciones intercoreanas de acuerdo con la esperanza de la nacion sino se empeorara mas la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana. 
					
					Park Geun-hye se responsabilizara de todas las consecuencias que emanen de la nominacion de Kim Kwan Jin.

articles.title: Japon debe pedir perdon e indemnizar sus crimenes del pasado, insiste Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japon debe pedir perdon e indemnizar sus crimenes del pasado, insiste Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 4 de junio (ACNC) -- Hace poco, en Japon se abrio la reunion del grupo recien fundado para investigar el proceso de publicacion de la declaracion de Kono, ex director del secretariado del gabinete, quien reconocio el arresto forzado de esclavas sexuales para el viejo ejercito japones. 
					En el pasado, Japon insistio tanto en continuar la declaracion de Kono, pero ahora tergiversa su historia criminal negando hasta las medidas tomadas por los gobiernos anteriores. 
					
					Esto es la expresion del malsano intento de los reaccionarios japoneses de encubrir su historia criminal negando la verdad y la justicia y realizar a toda costa la ambicion de nueva agresion convirtiendo la sociedad japonesa en la militarista y derechista, revela el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual de este miercoles y continua: 
					
					Las atrocidades cometidas en el siglo pasado por el imperialismo japones son crimenes antieticos nunca vistos en la historia de la humanidad. 
					
					Estan registrados muchas guerras y actos de agresion en la historia, pero no hubo los agresores tan barbaros como los imperialistas japoneses que arrestaron a 200 mil mujeres coreanas y las convirtieron en esclavas sexuales diciendo que asi se puede estimular mejor a la agresion a los uniformados.
					
					En los ultimos anos, los reaccionarios ultraderechistas japoneses niegan el caso de esclavitud sexual insistiendo en la revision de la declaracion de Kono. 
					
					La negacion de crimenes del pasado y la tergiversacion de la historia significan el preludio de nueva agresion. 
					
					En lugar de intentar inutilmente tachar de la memoria de la humanidad sus crimenes del pasado y los hechos de la historia, Japon debe pedir disculpas e indemnizarlos. Esto es la unica via para salir de la ignominia de pais enemigo.
